item.title: [NIITMTS] NIIT Subsidiary Acquires 100% Stake in SweetRush Inc. for Up to USD 26 Million
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

NIIT Learning Systems Limited announced that its wholly owned subsidiary, NIIT (USA) Inc., has acquired 100% equity stake in SweetRush Inc., a leader in strategic training interventions and high-end custom learning solutions. The acquisition, completed for up to USD 26 million including earnout amount payable over the next five years, is part of NIIT's growth strategy to build new capabilities, expand geographically, and penetrate attractive customer segments. SweetRush, founded in 2001 and headquartered in San Francisco, USA, has an estimated consolidated turnover of USD 22.4 million for the financial year ended December 31, 2025. The acquisition brings together SweetRush's custom, AI-enabled, human-centered learning experience design with NIIT's global managed learning scale, offering an expanded services portfolio and the opportunity to convert project-based relationships into longer-duration managed learning engagements.

  • NIIT (USA) Inc. acquires 100% equity stake in SweetRush Inc.
  • Transaction value up to USD 26 million including earnout amount.
  • Acquisition supports NIIT's growth strategy through building new capabilities and geographic expansion.
  • SweetRush is a leader in strategic training interventions and high-end custom learning solutions.
  • Estimated consolidated turnover of SweetRush for FY 2023-2025 is USD 22.4 million.

item.title: [NIITMTS] NIIT Learning Systems Ltd acquires SweetRush, Inc. to expand near-shore delivery capability in the Americas for USD 26 million

The acquisition includes annual performance-based earnouts over the next five years and is completed through NIIT (USA), Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of NIIT MTS. item.title: [ICICIGI] ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Inadvertently Discloses Draft Financial Results on WhatsApp
item.description:
ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Ltd. has reported an incident where a designated person inadvertently uploaded an unaudited draft financial result for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025, on their personal WhatsApp Status. The company took immediate action upon becoming aware of the incident by deleting the status. Investors are advised not to rely on this information until the audited financial results are approved and disseminated by the company. The company has initiated an internal inquiry as per the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, and will share the outcome of the inquiry with the Stock Exchanges.

  • ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company inadvertently disclosed an unaudited draft financial result on WhatsApp.
  • The company has advised investors not to rely on this information until the audited financial results are approved and disseminated.
  • The company took immediate action upon becoming aware of the incident by deleting the status.
  • The company has initiated an internal inquiry as per the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015.
  • The outcome of the inquiry will be shared with the Stock Exchanges.
